import React, { Component } from 'react' import jwt_decode from 'jwt-decode' class Profile extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { ID : props.match.params.id, first_name: '', last_name: '', email: '', errors: {} } } componentDidMount() {/* const token = localStorage.usertoken const decoded = jwt_decode(token) this.setState({ first_name: decoded.first_name, last_name: decoded.last_name, email: decoded.email })*/ fetch(`http://localhost:5000/users/profile/${this.state.ID}`) } render() { return (

PROFILE

Fist Name {this.state.first_name}
Last Name {this.state.last_name}
Email {this.state.email}
) } } export default Profile
